title: I have discovered the secret to making Aatrox strong again
body: {{item:3124}} and all the as you may desire

replies.body: Sated is pretty meh on aatrox tbh

With Sated wouldn't it make Aatrox only have to attack twice to get the heal from his w instead of thrice?
That would be insane sustain.

I've never played Aatrox before so this is only a theoretical assumption.
No because It applies on hit effects twice which generally doesn't include stacks but can if they are on hit effects (vayne silver bolts)
It is an on hit effect, but it only applies the stack to Aatrox himself not the enemy. Not sure if that means it won't proc Sated.
It does get applied every second hit actually (as do similar effects like jax ult, udyr phoenix stance etc.)
Farm, Don't die, keep lane pushed and Help others (All champions are strong)
The reason he's not good is because he gets kited too easily. Rageblade doesn't solve that.

yeah gj unique passives don't stack and attack speed is capped at 2.5per sec
^ Sarcasm (means I was joking)
I've never used that and now I will!
